channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s what happens to your HSA when you go on Medicare — and how to keep up the tax savings
item.description: Tax planning becomes a priority if you’re still working and can no longer fund an HSA.

item.title: The best investors avoid ‘revenge trading’ and other raw emotions. Here’s how you can too.
item.description: It’s not stock charts; it’s your mindset. This veteran trader’s insider tips can sharpen your skills.

item.title: McDonald’s may bring its 1,057-calorie Big Arch to America soon. Why it could be a billion-dollar burger.
item.description: McDonald’s is just one of a number of fast-food and fast-casual chains going the plus-size route with their burgers.

item.title: These home buyers are suing one of the biggest mortgage lenders in America. Why you should pay attention.
item.description: A class-action lawsuit against mortgage-lending giant Rocket Companies accuses the company of illegally steering homebuyers toward using their service...

item.title: A luxury ‘phobia’ is gripping these consumers. It’s a red flag for brands like Chanel and Gucci.
item.description: In China, conspicuous consumption is out, and “local heroes” are in.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
